page.title: 09GENERAL FARMING,QUARRY HOUSE
page.content: Most of the farms in this area are principally{arable}farms.One of these is{Quarry House Farm.}Mr T.J.Robson is the tenant of the 450 acres.350 acres are arable where he grows winter wheat,winter oats,winter barley, peas potatoes and oil seed rape. Only 10 acres are waste land and most of his land is flat.He has 350 sheep and several horses which he keeps for breeding.He has 2 30ft corn bins which store 40-50 tonnes of corn.{He has {less machinery}than he used to because the modern machines are{more {versatile.}He has 2 large combines which he shares with{Golden Moor Farm, several tractors,a bailer and a few arable implements.{A saftey inspector comes round{every 3 years to}check that everything is working correctly.
